title: US Navy: Penis in sky drawn by jet trail was 'unacceptable'
firstPar: US Navy officials have said it was "absolutely unacceptable" that one of their pilots used a jet's contrail to draw a penis in the sky.

title: Police officer slain near Pittsburgh is ID'd; gunman still at large
firstPar: A manhunt was underway in western Pennsylvania early Saturday for a suspect in the fatal shooting of a rookie police officer Friday night in a town outside Pittsburgh.

title: Lords push for new regulations to protect children online
firstPar: Cross-party support for amendment looks likely to lead to defeat for the government, which favours a code of practice
